about_the_game:
Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life. She's gotten used to it over time, but that doesn't mean she likes it. She doesn't have anyone she can call a friend, and she can't even remember the last time she chatted merrily with someone! But one day, she decides that enough is enough. She wants to change! She doesn't know exactly how yet, but the desire to do so is there...

In fact, her desire is so strong that it summons a spirit! Levizera heard her plea loud and clear. She wants to change? Then she'll make Hiyori an offer she can't refuse... literally! Waifu App is a magical piece of software that will grant her wish if she can make men think of her as wife material a thousand times. The deadline is 90 days, and she'll be cursed to live and die alone unless she meets it!

Follow Hiyori on her crazy journey of socialization and change on her way to learning how to make friends!

Choose your own adventure as Hiyori starts breaking out of her shell and exploring more of the town. With your room as your headquarters, gather rumors and find places where men who'd consider a loner like Hiyori wife material could be hiding.

As the game progresses, Hiyori will become bolder and more confident, giving her access to previously unavailable interactions. Earn money with side jobs to afford items that will help you along the way, and even learn several skills from Levizera that will assist you as you climb the social ladder in this social adventure RPG!

You're going to need those points for Waifu App unless you want to die alone... Better roll up your sleeves and put yourself out there!

Choose Your Own Adventure:

Will you befriend someone awkward or try your luck with an online forum? You have freedom in choosing how to make Hiyori grow and learn to interact with people again. The world is your oyster!

Slow Burn Story:

Change doesn't happen overnight, not even when a literal spirit is helping you out! Hiyori will take some time to break out of her shell and become a better person. Accompany her on her long path toward personal growth and fulfillment!

Skills, Items, and More

No heroine should brave the world alone, and Hiyori is no exception. Levizera is literally camping in her room, and she'll offer advice and teach her social skills that will open up more possibilities. And when that's not enough, hit the town shops to buy a few items. Who knows, maybe your friend is interested in that hot new manga...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

short_description: Hiyori lives a very quiet and lonely life, but she decides enough is enough... She wants to change! And everything indeed changes when a spirit visits her and installs a strange app on her phone! The clock's ticking now... There are 90 days left!
